column2: We have sent a verification code to {email}. Please check your email and enter the verification code below
Verification code will be like: XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX
Email verified! You can now login
I agree to the terms and conditions
Password must be at least 8 characters
Add your favorite restaurant or menu to the favorite list
Add your address for convenient delivery
Feature to manage address is under development
We are a leading online food ordering platform that connects customers with high-quality restaurants to enjoy delicious food from their favorite places
With advanced technology and friendly service we will provide a food ordering experience that is convenient fast and satisfying for you
We are a leading online food ordering platform that connects customers with high-quality restaurants to enjoy delicious food from their favorite places
Deliver food to your hand within 30-45 minutes
Restaurant with good quality through selection
Enter the subject of your message
Message sent successfully. We will contact you within 24 hours
Error sending message. Please try again
Please fill in all the information

1. Select a restaurant
2. Select a menu and add to cart
3. Check the list and fill in the delivery address
4. Select a payment method and confirm the order
We accept payment via credit card debit card bank transfer and cash on delivery (for some areas)
Normally it takes 30-45 minutes depending on the distance and the complexity of the order
You can track the order status in the "Order History" page or via email and SMS
You can cancel the order within 5 minutes after placing the order. If you exceed this time please contact the customer service
The delivery fee is 15 baht and may vary depending on the distance. For orders over 200 baht delivery is free
If you don't find the answer you're looking for please contact us at:\nPhone: {phone} | Email: {email}
By using our service you agree to comply with all terms and conditions outlined here
• You must be at least 18 years old or have parental consent\n• The information provided must be accurate and up-to-date\n• You are responsible for maintaining the security of your password
• The price shown includes tax\n• Payment must be made through the channels we have set up\n• You can cancel the order within 5 minutes after placing the order
• We try to deliver on time but there may be delays\n• The recipient must be at least 18 years old or have parental consent\n• If there is no one to receive we will contact you within 15 minutes
• If the food has quality issues we will refund or replace it\n• You must report the problem within 1 hour after receiving the food\n• Refunds will be processed within 7-14 business days
We are not responsible for any damage caused by the use of our service except in cases of our negligence
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time with advance notice of 30 days
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect use and protect your personal information

• Personal information (name email phone number)
• Delivery information (address delivery instructions)
• Payment information
• Device and usage information

• To process and deliver your orders
• To communicate with you about your orders
• To improve our services
• To send promotional materials (with your consent)

We do not sell your personal information. We share your information only with:
• Restaurants to fulfill your orders
• Delivery partners to deliver your orders
• Payment processors to process payments
We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information
We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze website traffic

You have the right to:
• Access your personal information
• Correct your personal information
• Delete your personal information
• Object to processing of your personal information
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy contact us at: {email}
We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes
